column5: I've been looking at the downloaded version of the MNR regs and can't figure out if Sudbury, south of Highway 17 falls into division 15 or 16.  Can anyone help me out here?  I'm trying to get out for a bit of shore fishing while I'm here visiting the area  Cheers!
Ah OK.  I'm guessing Ramsay Lake, here in town, is in 15 then.  That makes it crappie and perch fishin' for now sounds like!
I don't know for sure on that. Just know 16 is GBAY.  I think you were trying to decide on whether Sudbury is 15 or 18

According the exceptions to the regs.  Ramsey Lake - City of Sudbury - McKim and Neelon Twps Division 18 Fish Sanctuary Jan1 to last day in Feb  ...so from that I'd guess 18 ! And therefore you can fish for pike if they're in there...
Thanks a lot Irishfield...  Looks like I was looking at the wrong map!  All the best,
